snippet.title: The Path of Kara - Trailer
snippet.description:
Windows Phone Store: http://www.windowsphone.com/s?appid=e8ca01c2-1dc5-471d-b979-404f9aa12fee
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/AnsharStudios
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AnsharStudios
www: http://anshar.eu/

14.12.2012 on Windows Phone Store

Experience a brand new match-3 puzzle adventure!

Join Kara, a young shaman, on a quest to save her island from imminent danger. Solve puzzles, gather items and use powerful bonuses while exploring the land and meeting mysterious characters.

- Over 70 unique levels
- Various mechanics and bonuses
- Story-driven gameplay
- Arcade and logic challenges
- Demanding boss fights
- Hand drawn graphics
